  • Element
entropy.view.annotations

Annotation Type ViewDesc


  • @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
@Target(value=TYPE)
public @interface ViewDesc
    description of a view in annotations.
    Only one class with this annotation should be present in the project to create a plugin. This class should extend EmptyView. time
    This annotation is processed at compile time, to generate plugin description file in the jar.
    It also allows to guess where the Constraints, goals and heuristics are stored in the project.
    Author:
    guillaume

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String configFile
      the full name of the required config file, from the config repository(generally, working directory).
      if not set, or set to "", no config is required.
      String constraintsPackage
      path relative to the annotated class package to the package of constraints related to the view.
      String goalsPackage
      path relative to the annotated class package to the package of goals related to the view.

    • Element Detail

      • configFile

        public abstract String configFile
        the full name of the required config file, from the config repository(generally, working directory).
        if not set, or set to "", no config is required. If set to a file name, the plugin cannot be loaded unless such a file is found in config directory.
        Default:
        ""

      • goalsPackage

        public abstract String goalsPackage
        path relative to the annotated class package to the package of goals related to the view.
        Default:
        "goals"

      • constraintsPackage

        public abstract String constraintsPackage
        path relative to the annotated class package to the package of constraints related to the view.
        Default:
        "constraints"
